subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The chance to win the Super Bowl, and another chance to play for Bill Belichick, lured quarterback Vinny Testaverde out of a brief retirement when he signed with the Patriots on Nov. 14.
snippet: The chance to win the Super Bowl, and another chance to play for Bill Belichick, lured quarterback Vinny Testaverde out of a brief retirement when he signed with the Patriots on Nov. 14.
